text: وَشَدَدْنَا مُلْكَهُۥ وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُ ٱلْحِكْمَةَ وَفَصْلَ ٱلْخِطَابِ

translation.en.sahih: And We strengthened his kingdom and gave him wisdom and discernment in speech.
translation.id.indonesian: Dan Kami kuatkan kerajaannya dan Kami berikan kepadanya hikmahdan kebijaksanaan dalam menyelesaikan perselisihan.
